name: The Ultimate Snack Attack
description:
JCVD want tot buy some fries but something happen with the fritkot owner.

You want fries ?

You want fight ?

Lets play Snack Attack !!!

Commands:

Use 2 xbox controller to play (You may have to change the input in the unity input options)

Will you find the special move for the Fatality? Or will you use 'Start' like a noob?

A: Kick

X: Punch

Special attacks: "Hadoken" move with Punch and Kick

Start: Fatality

Escape: Quit
